root.ad_description_full: Type: Offshore Cruisers Sales status: available Manufacturer: Fairline Model:phantom 37 fly Model:phantom 37 fly Mooring Country: United Kingdom Year built: 1996 Flag: uk Length: 11.25 m/37 ft Width: 3.70 m/12 ft Draft: 1.10 m/4 ft Weight dry: 12.39 Trade in possible: yes Propulsion: Inboard Engine manufacturer:volvo penta tamd63l Engine manufacturer:volvo penta tamd63l No. of engines: 2 Engine hours: 330 HP: 318 KW: 474 Fuel: Diesel About REDUCED , QUICK SALE. 1996 fairline phantom 37 fly boat in good order full med spec on shaft priced to sell firm .just polished and antfouled all new anodes ect September 2015,a broker can handle paper work ,legal matters at cost to buyer.BEST OFFER over £50k firm.
